ComicInfo.Summary:
Jason, Zack, and Trini are leaving Earth to officially join the Omega Rangers -- but it means their former team is now down three people, with Lord Zedd about to launch his ultimate weapon! Zordon and Alpha-5 search desperately for worthy successors, but will it be enough to stop the enemy?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Connecting Cover A | Eleonora Carlini (a) & Raul Angulo (c) | 1 | B | Preorder Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 2 | Var | 1:20 Album Variant Cover | Amelia Vidal | 3 | *Notes:* The 1:20 Album Variant Cover is a homage of the album cover for Jay-Z's Vol. 2... Hard Knock Life.
